sections.1_story: Imagine you are at a family gathering and someone asks, 'How is your mother's brother related to you?' Blood Relations questions test your ability to understand and analyze family relationships, which is a key reasoning skill for exams.

5_exam_examples.question: If A is the brother of B and B is the sister of C, how is A related to C?
5_exam_examples.answer: Brother or Sister (depending on C's gender)

5_exam_examples.question: If P is the father of Q and Q is the mother of R, how is P related to R?
If X is the son of Y and Y is the daughter of Z, how is Z related to X?
If M is the sister of N and N is the father of O, how is M related to O?
If A is the mother of B and B is the father of C, how is A related to C?
